SELECT COUNT(id) AS todayCluesNum FROM `tb_clue` WHERE id IN ( SELECT assign_id FROM `tb_assign_record` WHERE `type` = 0 AND `latest` = 1 AND `user_name` = #{username} AND create_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') )

SELECT CAST(IFNULL(SUM(h.`contract_order`),0) AS DECIMAL (30, 0)) AS todaySalesAmount FROM `tb_contract` h WHERE h.create_by = #{username} AND h.create_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(id)) AS TofollowedBusinessNum FROM `tb_business` WHERE id IN ( SELECT assign_id FROM `tb_assign_record` WHERE `type` = 1 AND `latest` = 1 AND `user_name` = #{username} AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}) and status = 1

SELECT id FROM `tb_business` WHERE STATUS IN (1, 2, 7) AND clue_id IN ( SELECT id FROM tb_clue WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND STATUS IN (1, 2, 6, 7) ) )) AS contractNums

SELECT COUNT(t1.id) num, ROUND(COUNT(t1.id)/ ( -- 给定时间端内的线索的id SELECT COUNT(id) FROM tb_clue WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND STATUS IN ( 1,2,6,7)) *100 ,2) AS radio, t1.create_by , t3.dept_name AS deptName FROM `tb_business` t1 INNER JOIN `sys_user` t2 ON t1.create_by = t2.user_name INNER JOIN `sys_dept` t3 ON t2.dept_id = t3.dept_id WHERE t1.clue_id IN ( SELECT id FROM tb_clue WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND STATUS IN ( 1,2,6,7) -- 给定时间端内的线索。统计这些线索的转化top榜
) GROUP BY t1.create_by,t2.dept_id,t3.dept_name ORDER BY num DESC

SELECT COUNT(t1.id) num, ROUND(COUNT(t1.id)/ ( -- 给定时间端内的线索的id SELECT COUNT(id) FROM tb_business WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND STATUS IN ( 1,2,6,7)) *100 ,2) AS radio, t1.create_by as create_by, t3.dept_name AS deptName FROM `tb_contract` t1 INNER JOIN `sys_user` t2 ON t1.create_by = t2.user_name INNER JOIN `sys_dept` t3 ON t2.dept_id = t3.dept_id
WHERE t1.business_id IN ( SELECT id FROM tb_business WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND STATUS IN ( 1,2,6,7) -- 给定时间端内的线索。统计这些线索的转化top榜 ) GROUP BY t1.create_by,t2.dept_id,t3.dept_name ORDER BY num DESC
